DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , randomize , open-label , single- multiple-dose , five-treatment , two-period , four-way parallel study compare pharmacokinetics ( PK ) Diazoxide Choline Controlled-Release Tablet ( DCCR ) administer orally feed fasting condition two dose level .
DOC.brief_title: Open-Label , Single- Multiple-Dose Pharmacokinetic Study Diazoxide Choline
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Healthy adult Fasting glucose ≤ 125 mg/dL HbA1C ≤ 6.5 Fasting triglyceride ≥150 mg/dL ≤ 500 mg/dL Known CAD , DM , uncontrolled HTN Pregnancy unable complaint birth control method require
